'''Chief Sato''' is a battalion chief for the Seattle Fire Department.

==History==
When station 19 arrived at [[Pacific Northwest General Hospital]], Sato informed Maya that there'd been an explosion at the hospital, which was closed except for some ER transfers, radiology on the first floor, and a research lab in the basement. They also believed a gas leak had caused the explosion, until a second explosion happened on the third floor. Sato continued to coordinate the scene from outside the hospital, working with Maya. When they learned lost radio contact with the members of station 19 left inside, they worked with the bomb squad and search and rescue to find them and free them. After a final explosion, which they were able to dampen using an autoclave, the firefighters were freed.

==Career==
He is a battalion chief with the [[Seattle Fire Department]].
